summary: The Marx Brothers try to help the owner of a circus recover some stolen funds before he finds himself out of a job.
cast: Groucho Marx|Chico Marx|Harpo Marx|Kenny Baker|Florence Rice|Eve Arden|Margaret Dumont|Nat Pendleton|Fritz Feld|James Burke|Jerry Maren|Barnett Parker|Irving Bacon|Willie Best|John Binns|Henry Blair|William A. Boardway|George Bookasta|James Carlisle|James Conaty|Frank Darien|Dudley Dickerson|Helen Dickson|Hazel Dohlman|Betsy Gay|Charles Gemora|John George|Dick Gordon|Bobbie Hale|Stuart Hall|Harry Hayden|Shep Houghton|Payne B. Johnson|Carl M. Leviness|Robert Locke Lorraine|Buck Mack|Murdock MacQuarrie|Matt McHugh|Charles Meakin|Harold Miller|Edmund Mortimer|Forbes Murray|Frank Orth|Emory Parnell|Lillian Randolph|Paul Ravel|Larry Steers|Charles Sullivan|Fred Walburn|Robert Winkler
title: Una tarde en el circo
